Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello my campaign still pending for 2 days

Hi there! If your campaign is still pending after 2 days, it might be due to the verification process. If your account is new and not yet verified, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
Hello
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
Where can I find the postback url?
Could you please let me know which tracking platform you are using for the postback URL? This will help me provide you with the specific instructions.
Clickbank

Great! For setting up a ClickBank postback on NewsBreak, you can follow the instructions in this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need any further assistance!
OK
If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
My postback tracking with clickbank don't work
I'm sorry to hear that your postback tracking with ClickBank isn't working. Could you please provide more details about the issue you're facing? This will help me assist you better.
I can't see the convensions on my newsbreak campaigns

Let's try to troubleshoot this issue. Please make sure you have followed all the steps in the ClickBank postback setup guide. Here are a few things to check:
1. Ensure that you have updated to Version 8.0, as Version 7.0 is no longer supported.
2. Verify that you have correctly set up the postback URL in ClickBank with the parameter `tid=__CALLBACK_PARAM__`.
3. Test the postback integration by triggering a conversion event and checking if it appears on NewsBreak.
For detailed instructions, please refer to this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak).
If you've checked all these and it's still not working, please let me know!
Ok but in the article is using extclid like callback_param

I apologize for the confusion. You are correct, the article mentions using `extclid` as the callback parameter. Please ensure you are using `extclid=__CALLBACK_PARAM__` in your postback URL setup. If you continue to experience issues, please let me know and we can further troubleshoot.
HEELO
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
Why for me the video size is 20Mb and for my frind using other account is 500mb?

It sounds like there might be different account settings or permissions in place. Could you please provide more details about the type of accounts you and your friend are using? This will help me understand the situation better and provide more accurate assistance.
I dont know

No worries! It might be helpful to check the account settings or permissions for both accounts. If you need further assistance, you can reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about the issue. They will be able to look into your account specifics and help resolve the discrepancy.
